data.meta_description: Congenital Diaphragmatic Hernia Study Group Publications (Impact Factor (IF) summation) 1998-1999 (IF sum: 3.4) 1. Clark RH, Hardin WD, Hirschl RB, Jaksic T, Lally KP, Langham MR, Wilson JM. Current Surgical Management of Congenital Diaphragmatic Hernia – A Report of...
data.text:
Publications

Congenital Diaphragmatic Hernia Study Group Publications (Impact Factor (IF) summation)

1998-1999 (IF sum: 3.4)

1. Clark RH, Hardin WD, Hirschl RB, Jaksic T, Lally KP, Langham MR, Wilson JM. Current Surgical Management of Congenital Diaphragmatic Hernia – A Report of the Congenital Diaphragmatic Hernia Study Group. J Pediatr Surg 33:1004-1009, 1998 PMID: 9694085

2000-2003 (IF sum: 5.1)
